scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix main" "npm run dev --prefix blog" "npm run dev --prefix dashboard"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/ui && npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-utils
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --prefix main && npm run build --prefix blog && npm run build --prefix dashboard
scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:apps
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix main && npm install --prefix blog && npm install --prefix dashboard
